name: web-sql-batch-helper
description: Web SQL transaction helper if not all SQL is available in the same tick

scripts.distclean: rm -rf dist cordovaTestApp/www/js/index.js cordovaTestApp/platforms cordovaTestApp/plugins webTest/js/index.js test.db node_modules
scripts.makedist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && coffee -p src/index.coffee > dist/index.es6.js && rollup dist/index.es6.js -o dist/index.cjs.js -f cjs
scripts.start: npm run makedist && rollup webTest/src/index.js -o webTest/js/index.js -f cjs
scripts.start2: npm run makedist && rollup cordovaTestApp/src/index.js -o cordovaTestApp/www/js/index.js -f cjs

author: Christopher J. Brody
